TESTIMONIALS

“FloCareer is an excellent platform for interviewing candidates. I have been associated with FLO as a technical interview panel for the last three years now. I have not only grown financially; but intellectually as well due to this collaboration. It helps me stay up-to-date with the current trends in the tech domain. It also gives me an opportunity to interact with the young and passionate minds”
Nanda kumar (13 years Experience)
Celebrating Freelancing with FloCareer for last 3 years
“When I made the decision to be a freelancer, little did I know that it was going to make a huge change in my life. I have been a Freelancer (Technical interviewer) for almost 3 years now and have been interviewing for different clients and various requisites.
FloCareer gave me the opportunity to rebuild my career as a Freelance Interviewer while I was on a career break. The work here helps me in maintaining a better "Work/Life" balance. The best part of being a freelancer is work flexibility, freedom and I am so much confident in my ability to connect with people and also it has helped me grow in leaps and bounds. It is an absolute pleasure to work with a really professional team. I look forward to continuing this relationship.”
Pooja B (Ex-Amazon, Freelancer Interviewer on FloCareer)
Celebrating Freelancing with FloCareer for last 3 years
“In today's gig economy; interviewing platforms such as FLO are benefiting all three stakeholders; hiring companies; candidates as well as interviewers. As a hiring manager myself in one of the IT MNC; I understand the criticality of hiring the right talent. I truly enjoy taking interviews on FLO; especially due to its efficient automated reminders; and feature-rich interview page”
Nisarg Rathod (11 years Experience)
Celebrating Freelancing with FloCareer for last 2 years
“I come with 10 years of experience in the IT industry with various domains. Continuous learning is very important for every individual and I think technical interviews (either giving or taking) are one of the great ways to learn from other's experiences. FloCareer provided me this great opportunity at a large scale and also an option to have side income. It's been 9+ months for me being associated with the company and I have taken around 700 interviews so far for various clients from startups to multinational companies. Looking forward to a lot more milestones to celebrate together."
Alias - DM975 (10 years Experience)
Celebrating Freelancing with FloCareer for last 9 months
